query:
SELECT 
  sourceType,
  COUNT(*) as total_upset,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upsetBidCloseDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_close_date,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN upsetBidCloseDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 1) as coverage_pct
FROM properties 
WHERE saleStatus = 'in_upset_period'
GROUP BY sourceType
ORDER BY total_upset DESC
command:

  COUNT(*) as total_upset,
  SUM(CASE WHEN upsetBidCloseDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_close_date,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN upsetBidCloseDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 1) as coverage_pct
FROM properties 
WHERE saleStatus = 'in_upset_period'
GROUP BY sourceType
ORDER BY total_upset DESC
